segments.text: Good evening . Room Service . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Please send one " Fried Rice , Hangzhou Style " and one " Fruit Salad " to my room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any particular brand you like , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir.Is there anything else you want , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I know how many of you so that I could prepare the right set of tableware ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me . May I know your name and room number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , that's one " Fried Rice , Hangzhou Style " , one " Fruit Salad " and two bottles of Carlsborg beer . We'll send them to your room in 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
